alert.note: Alert for Adams; Franklin; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 14 at 2:51AM CST until December 14 at 3:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Franklin County in southwestern Mississippi... Northeastern Adams County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 345 AM CST. * At 251 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Cranfield, or near Natchez, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Natchez, Fayette, Cranfield, Stampley, Red Lick, Stanton, Mcnair and Lorman. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
